import React,{useContext} from 'react' import './messenger.css' import Topbar from "../../components/topbar/Topbar" import Conversation from '../../components/conversation/Conversation' import Message from '../../components/message/Message' import ChatOnline from "../../components/chatonline/ChatOnline" import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext' function Messenger() { const [conversation, setConversation] = useState([]) const {user} = useContext(AuthContext) console.log(user) useEffect(()=>{ }) return ( <>
) } export default Messenger
